title: West Lancashire: £333 Million Over a Decade of Spending Data
summary: Ten years of spending data from West Lancashire Borough Council — 43,063 transactions to 4,614 suppliers. The lowest fraud triangle score of the new councils at 57.8, but an 8.2% Benford's Law deviation and 12.7x year-end spike demand attention.
